page.title: 13St.Mary's Estate - Haywood
page.content: Little Haywood is dominated by a modern estate of houses they are built on the former Manor Farm and part of the St.Mary's Abbey land.(Convent) The development was planned to create a village atmosphere.All houses built were detached until recently, when at the request of the Parish Council some semi detached houses were included. The 400 houses have trees planted by the builders and a larged grassed open space for play is somewhere near the centre. This is in the position of a former pond. There are no shops in the estate, although they were planned along with a new Pub.
